name: Deepak Chopra's Leela
description:
Deepak Chopra's Leela combines traditional relaxation and meditation with Wii motion technology to instill a sense of balance and harmony to every day life.

Features

• Rebalance and Revitalize. Flow with your natural rhythms and full-body gestures to unwind and relax
• Ambient Oasis. Immerse yourself in Leela's restorative environments filled with rich visuals and healing sound
• Personal Creativity. Create a personal mandala - an artistic expression of your essence
